      • give

        public boolean give(org.bukkit.entity.Player player,
                    double amount)
        Give amount to the player. This return true most of the time, but it might be false if your economy plugin has maximum limit, or any other reason to not allow adding more money to the player.
        Parameters:
        player -
        amount -
        Returns:
        true on success; false on fail

      • take

        public boolean take(org.bukkit.entity.Player player,
                    double amount)
        Take money from the player. It returns false if player doesn't have enough money.
        Parameters:
        player -
        amount -
        Returns:
        true on success; false if not enough fund or any other reason depends on economy plugin.
